Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 本課程介紹現有無線區域網路規格的多工存取層及實體層，並深入解說規格中所使用通訊技術的原理，如載波偵測多工－避免碰撞通訊協定，正交分頻多工調變技術。
description.en: This course contains the medium access control layer(MAC) and physical layer(PHY) of the mose recent IEEE 802.11 standards for wireless local area networks. Thechniques employed by the standards, e.g.,craier sense multiple access/collision avoidance (CSMA/CA),orthogonal frequency-division multiplexing (OFDA), will be discussed in details.

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 中文內容概述: 本課程為大學部「電磁波」課程之延伸，強調無線通訊工程中常用之相關電磁波解析技巧，包括時間簡諧電磁場，物質的電性研究，高等電磁理論與原理、以及其他微波與毫米波新型技術
description.en: This course encompasses the most complete treatment on the electromagnetics for wireless communication engineering. It includes the physical and mathematical foundations of the theory of advanced electromagnetics, time-harmonic electromagnetic fields, electrical properties of matter, and other novel topics related to modern microwave and millimeter-wave technology.

description.zh: 1.傳輸線2.散射參數3.微波主動元件4.寬頻放大電路5.低雜訊放大電路6.功率放大器7.高穩定振盪器8.壓控振盪器9.鎖相迴路10.混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

notes: 電子所與電資外生專班合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：1.散射參數與網路分析儀2.頻譜儀介紹3.自動化量測4.平面化傳輸線5.射頻集總元件與阻抗匹配6.積體電路封裝7.射頻耦合器8.射頻濾波器學生能從這門課學習到射頻被動元件的分析、設計與應用。
description.en: This course covers: 1.S-parameter and Network Analyzer2.Introduction to Spectrum Analyzer3.Automatic Measurement4.Planar Transmission Lines5.RF Lump Elements and Impedance Matching6.IC Package7.RF Coupler8.RF FilterThe students can learn the analysis, design, and applications of RF passive circuits from this course.

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.zh: 智慧車用通訊網路系統設計
name.en: Intelligent Vehicle Communication Network System Design

description.zh: 本課程目標在於探討與設計智慧車用網路通訊系統，課程內容分別介紹車用通訊技術，內部連接網路通訊系統，LIN (Local Interconnect Network)通訊協定、CAN (Controller Area Network) 通訊協定、FlexRay通訊協定、MOST (Media Oriented Systems Transport)，以及探討車用無線通訊與乙太網路(Ethernet)系統，同時介紹各個通訊協定間之閘道器設計。本課程進行方式以講演授課及系統實作，課程大綱如下：1.簡介2.LIN通訊協定與系統3.CAN通訊協定與系統4.FlexRay通訊協定與系統5.MOST通訊協定與系統6.閘道器設計7.無線通訊與乙太網路(Ethernet)系統8.專題研究
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss and design the intelligent vehicle network communication system. The course contents include: vehicle communication technology, internal connection network communication system, LIN (Local Interconnect Network) communication protocol, CAN (Controller Area Network) communication protocol, FlexRay communication protocols, MOST (Media Oriented Systems Transport). The wireless communications and Ethernet systems in vehicle will be discussed. The gateway design between the various communication protocols is introduced. The procedure of this course uses lecture presentation and to practice system implementation. The course outline is as follows:1.Introduction2.LIN communication protocol and system3.CAN communication protocol and system4.FlexRay communication protocol and system5.MOST communication protocol and system6.Gateway design7.Wireless communication and Ethernet (Ethernet) system8.Project research

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1.電源管理IC設計簡介 2.電壓參考電路設計 3.低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4.交換式電壓調整器 5.交換電容電源轉換器 6.電池充電技術與應用 7.設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何設計與應用微控制器，啟發學生對於微控制器的創意設計。包含：1.相關程式撰寫、2.跑馬燈程式撰寫與實作驗證、3.序列埠控制 (監控視窗、LED控制)、4.七段顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、5.LED矩陣程式撰寫與實作驗證、6.LCD顯示器程式撰寫與實作驗證、7. PWM馬達控制程式撰寫與實作驗證、8. I2C介面程式撰寫與實作驗證、9.電子琴程式撰寫與實作驗證。10.超音波感測程式撰寫與實作驗證。
description.en: This course is to train students for microcontrollers design and applications.  Inspire students to creative microcontroller design. Comprising: 1. Related programs written. 2. Marquee program written and implement verification. 3. Serial port control (monitoring windows, LED control). 4. Seven segment display program written and implement verification. 5. LED matrix program written and implement verification. 6. LCD display program written and implement verification. 7. PWM motor control program written and implement verification. 8. I2C interface program written and implement verification. 9. Keyboard program written and implement verification. 10. Ultrasonic sensing program written and implement verification.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎   1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質   1.2 遞迴關係之解   1.3 數學歸納法2. 基本分析技巧   2.1 計算複雜度之上下限   2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析   2.3 動態平均分析3. 基本設計技巧   3.1 分擊法   3.2 貪婪法   3.3 動態規劃   3.4 隨機演算法4. 計算複雜度   4.1 資訊理論證明法   4.2 對抗式證明法   4.3 問題之線性轉換   4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background   1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions   1.2 Solving recurrence relations   1.3 Mathematical induction2. Basic analysis techniques   2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds   2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis   2.3 Amortized analysis3. Basic Design Paradigms   3.1 Divide and conquer   3.2 Greedy methods   3.3 Dynamic programming   3.4 Probabilistic algorithms4. Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 車輛控制實驗內容包括: (1)利用Matlab/Simulink設計控制器；(2)輸入/輸出訊號處理；(3)車輛控制應用實務。學生將學習車輛控制的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具設計與實踐控制器，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle control requirements, and utilizing tools to design and implement the controller. Topics include: (1) Controller design using Matlab/Simulink, (2) Input/output signal processing, and (3) Practical application of vehicle control.

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避孼與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場/消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously.    The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 透過一系列的資料採集、參考與互動，包含經驗分享、影片欣賞等，帶領修課同學探索創新（Innovation）、創業（Startup）以及最重要的 – 創業家創新精神（Entrepreneur Innovative Thinking）之本質。無論是工作上的創造，學習上的創造，或者是(創)事業上的創造，都必然需要一定程度的創新，才能在全球化競爭以及指數型科技（Exponential Technology）發展的趨勢下存活，最終獲得勝利、創造價值。
description.en: Through series of classes to train students embracing the innovative thinking and gradually internalize it to become innovative entrepreneurship. Since the generation is changing so rapidly, the competitors are no longer came from local land but from everywhere in global village. Under this highly competitive world, every one of us need to fully embrace the true value of innovation, and incubate our own entrepreneurship with hack spirit, which will lead us to an island of innovation.

description.zh: 透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en: The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

description.zh: 本課程主要包含四部份，分別為基本有限差分法、流體力學與熱傳方程式的有限差分法應用、有限體積法、格點產生法。
description.en: This course comprises four parts. Part one is fundamentals of finite-difference methods. Part 2 is the application of finite-difference methods to the equations of fluid mechanics and heat transfer. Part 3 is finite-volume method. Part 4 is grid generation.

name.zh: 電動車與冷凍空調系統之微處理器
name.en: Application of microprocessor on electrical vehicle and refrigerator air-conditioning system

description.zh: 本課程是應用電子學進階課程。主要重點在教授微處理器應用於電動車與冷凍空調系統，並強調以實務練習及範例設計為主的方式。本課程介紹 CANbus系統 ，使用Freescale開發的嵌入式實驗開發平台，介紹微處理器電路設計最重要的觀念，以及 ARM晶片架構與系統程式等相關重點。
description.en: This course is the advanced electronics. The main goal is to introduce the application of microelectronics on the electric vehicle and refrigerator, air conditioning system. The lectures will focus on the practice and example design. The contents include two parts. First one is the introduction of Controller Area Network (CAN, or CANbus).   Second one is the introduction of the microelectronics circuits. All the application and circuits design will be practiced on the developing board of Freescale Company.

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Communication Systems

description.zh: 1.信號與線性系統2.隨機程序3.類比調變4.類此與數位轉換5.基頻數位傳輸6.有限頻寬通道數位傳輸7.數位載波傳輸8.通道容量與編碼9.展頻通訊系統10.Simulink介紹與實例探討
description.en: 1.Signals and Linear Systems2.Random Processes3.Analog Modulation4.Analog-to-Digital Conversion5.Baseband Digital Transmission6.Digital Transmission Through Bandlimited Channels7.Digital Transmission via Carrier Modulation8.Channel Capacity and Coding9.Spread Spectrum Communication Systems10.Simulink Tutorial and Case Study

description.zh: 1.複數2.複函數 3.諧和函數4.複數積分5.柯西積分理論6.複冪級數7.洛冉級數,餘數8.保角寫像
description.en: 1.Complex Numbers2.Complex Functions3.Harmonic Functions4.Complex Integration5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 6.Complex Power Series7.Laurent Series,Residues8.Conformal Mapping

notes: 電資二與電子大三大四合開

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh: 藉由大量的人物寫生，從人性關懷的角度速寫記錄人生百態，速寫重點要「神」、「形」兼備。下一步是靜態單人速寫練習，體態美見於動、靜、張、弛的表現，且比例要正確。下筆速、簡、精、準、是練習重點。接下來是靜態雙人、多人速寫練習。除了依循單人速寫練習要點，並加入空間透視感，使畫面構成更生動有趣。
description.en: The course begins with a lot of figure sketching. You have to care about all walks of life, and actively observe and record their figures. Try to master both the charm and the form of the model.  Next focusing on static mono-figure sketching, you have to demonstrate your techniques in presenting either the static or the dynamic, the state of tension or looseness. You also have to be precise in proportion when you do your sketch. Stress definitely on the practice of speediness, simplicity, accuracy, and preciseness. Also work on static twin-figure and multi-figure sketching. Besides incorporating guidelines from the previous activity, you have to add the sense of spatial perspective to make your sketch more vivid and

notes: 工設二三四與創意三四合開

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: 講授電腦輔助造型設計之繪圖技巧，以Alias軟體之3D曲面特性，傳授3D surface軟體之立體造型繪圖技巧，空間概念與產品設計之應用，訓練學生以電腦繪圖達到3D造型繪製與修改的基本能力與技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Alias software building conceptual product models and creating quality surface with a comprehensive set of digital modeling 、shape、definition。

description.zh: 室內設計場景細部的處理，例如進階的燈光及材質表現，同時培養同學互相討論與問題解決。
description.en: The sophisticated treatment for the scene of indoor design, like advanced light and material performance, which can train classmates to have the capacity of mutual discussion and problem-solving at the same time.

name.en: Energy Conservation and Carbon Reduction Technology

description.zh: 本課程介紹各項節能減碳科技之原理與應用技術。本課程將講授通風與空調系統節能、冷凍系統節能、照明系統節能、能源管理系統、廢熱回收與熱泵系統節能應用，碳排放與碳足跡之計算，減碳原理與技術。
description.en: This course covers the fundamentals and applications of energy conservation and carbon reduction technology. This course introduce the conservation technologies of ventilation and air-conditioning systems, refrigeration system, lighting system, energy management systems, waste heat recovery and heat pump system; calculation of carbon production and carbon foot print, principles and technologies of carbon reduction.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
description.en: This course will cover the progress of management, the theories of management and the future of management. It consists of 1. Organization and management. 2. Philosophies of management. 3. The function of management. 4. Communication. 5. The future of management. 6. Case studies.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於教導學生能夠以線性代數中所提供之各種方法來求解線性連立方程組，並奠定研習線型規畫，作業研究，等課程之基礎。由於本系分兩組教學，因應之課程內容分別為：管理組：矩陣、方程式之解、行列式、向量、微分方程式及應用問題等。工程組：矩陣方程式之解、行列式、向量及向量空間等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the linear algebra by using several different methods to solve the linear dependent equations and to build up the fundamental knowledge of linear programming and Operation Research. Two groups instruct the contents of this course. For the engineering group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors, differential equations and its implementation are included. For the management group the array, solution of combinatory equations, vectors and vector spaces are included.

description.zh: 將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en: To practice product model building techniques . Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 1. 資料表示法，2. 個人電腦硬體結構，3.組合語言的基楚知識，4.資料傳送、定址模式，5.數學運算，6.分支與迴路7.位元運算，8.字串運算，9.副程式與巨集之應用， 10.基本字元的輸入與輸出，11.日期與時間的管理，12.磁碟目錄管理，13.檔案管理，14.記憶體管理，15.DOS/BIOS，16.聲音與系統資源。
description.en: Experiments with assembly languages.Contents include:1.Data representation2.PC hardware structure3.Fundamentals of assembly language4.Data transfor5.Mathematical operation6.Bit and string operation7.Procedure calls8.File systems9.Memory management10.Processes and process management

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: This course is a basic topics of  Materials Science.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解數位訊號處理的理論基礎及其應用技巧。課程內容包含：(1)離散傅立葉轉換及快速傅立葉轉換 (2)Z-轉換在信號處理上之應用 (3)相關函數，迴旋積分及其應用 (4)FIR數位濾波器設計 (5)IIR數位濾波器設計 (6)適應性訊號處理介紹 (7)工程應用及實例研討。
description.en: This course introduces the basic theory of digital signal processing and its application. The course outline includes: (1) Discrete-time Fourier Transform and Fast Fourier Transform (2) Z-Transform and its application (3) Correlation Fucntion, Convoluation Integral and its application (4) FIR digital filter design (5) IIR Digital Filter Desgin (6) Adaptive Signal Processing (7) Practical Application

description.zh: 1. 半導體物理特性分析2. 二極體電路設計3. BJT放大器設計4. FET放大器設計5. 頻率響應分析及設計6. 回授放大器設計7. 差動及多級大器設計8. 連算放大器設計9. 振盪器設計10. 主動濾器設計11. 穩壓電路設計
description.en: 1. Semiconductor characterics2. Diode Circuits Design 3. BJT Amp. Design4. FET Amp. Design5. Frequency response Analysis and Design6. Feedback Amp. Design7. Differential Amp. And multistage Amp. Design8. Operational Amp Design9. Oscillator design.  10. Active filter Design.  11. Power supply Design.

notes: 電機大三合開,修課人數限50人

description.zh: 學習Music Maker 16軟體的功能操作，並引導學生使用軟體加上課堂上教授的編曲要素、MIDI輸入、合成器的使用及混音技巧…等，融會貫通製作出自己的第一首歌。
description.en: To learn “Music Maker 16” functional operation, and to guide students working software on arranger elements, MIDI input, and the use of synthesizers and mixing skills. We expect students can produce their first song by performing music maker.

notes: 計網電腦教室；文發三與最後一哩合開

name.en: Research and Practices of Data Mining

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題: 1.知識發現與資料探勘概論 2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用 3.資料處理技術 4.教導型學習方法 5.教導型學習方法 6.關聯法則探勘 7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用。
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics. 1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics 2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining 3.Data processing 4.Supervised learning 5.Unsupervised learning 6.Association rules mining 7.Applications of data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business management.

description.zh: 本課程介紹國際金融市場以及金融系統。本課程涵蓋範圍包含: 股票市場、貨幣市場、債券市場、外匯市場、房貸市場、投資銀行、保險產業、基金市場…等。主要目的在讓學生了解整個金融市場是如何運作。同時以個案討論方式讓學生對整體的金融市場與機構有通盤的了解。
description.en: This course introduces the international financial markets (i.e. money market, bond market, stock market, mortgage market, foreign exchange market, investment banks, commercial banks…etc). The objectives of this course are to develop a fundamental understanding of (i) how financial markets work; (ii) how financial systems affect people and daily life.

name.zh: 新能源車輛技術發展與實務工程
name.en: Technology Development and its Industry Engineering Practice

description.zh: 本課程在於讓學生對於新能源車輛產業及其工程實務有廣泛的了解，產業面包括產業現況、法規、政策、動力系統技術，工程實務則涵括動力、傳動、能源、控制等系統之開發及維護，及車輛業界產品開發中心及維修廠之企業參訪。課程中之動力系統將包括半複合動力、全複合動力、純電動車及氫燃料電池系統，能源系統將討論鉛酸電池、鎳鐵電池、鋰電池，及其充放電機制及管理系統。
description.en: 1.To educate student to have a general comprehensive knowledge on green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, powertrain technology and its Industry Engineering Practice including the development and maintenance processes of the powertrain, transmission, energy, control systems, and the industry practice at the product development center or the service station of the car company. 2.The powertrain system will include the mild-hybrid, full hybrid, pure motor drive, and fuel cell systems. The energy system will include the introduction of the lead acid, nickel-metal hydride, and lithium-ion batteries, and their charging-discharging mechanism and its management devices.3.This class will lead the students to be able to learn the process of the green vehicle development and also to have an opportunity to receive the lectures from the car maker experts on the car maker product development center or the service station.

description.zh: 本課程的設計，以文化事業(cultural vocation)的發展為目標，培訓學生動手實作能力為核心，進而建構:工業4.0智能製造範疇的3D建模 能力，培養學生未來在職場中的競爭力。綜合加法加工的3D成型列印技術與減法加工的CNC 3軸加工技術，結合國際市場上的通用專業軟體，進行系統化的單元講解，連結幾何物件，導入產業中常見的3D建模設計，再經由同學間的團隊合作，建構起完整的組合件產品。本課程的教學模式，採用國立臺北科大經典的黑手工程師訓練模式，強調動手式的 OJT (On Job Training)。課堂上會有大量的實務型動手演練實作，下課後會有一定數量的 Homework與 Exercise，透過此系統性訓練課程，將使學員(學生)具備微(小)型企業(工作室)的3D 建模與加法製造基本知識與加工生產能力。
description.en: The course is designed to target the development of cultural vocation, training student hands-on ability as the core, and then construct:In Industry 4.0 intelligent manufacturing areas: to build 3D modeling capabilities in the future. 3D machining technology combined with 3D Addition Stack Processing Machining and 3D Subtraction Processing Machining technology. Also, this course works with general software on the international market. It is a systematic unit to explain and connect geometric objects and import common 3D modeling design in the industry. Follow teamwork spirit to build a complete portfolio of products.The teaching mode of the course: using the TaipeiTech classic Practice-Engineer training model, emphasizing the hands-on OJT (On Job Training) method.There will be a large number of hands-on exercises in the classroom, and a number of homework and exercises after class. After this systematic training course, students (trainee) will have basic 3D modeling manufacturin

description.zh: 工藝產品設計是一門以實作為主，理論與實務講述為輔的工藝設計性創作課程。透過實務教學進行或參訪各類型藝文工作坊，提供學生視覺藝術與工藝設計等廣泛多元的文化創新課程。課程旨在結合工藝設計產出與微型創業的趨勢，從介紹工藝設計發展、材料種類、技法使用，到進入實作，並導入未來的創業精神。學生系統性的完成作品後，將透過展演形式發表成果。
description.en: This course will use a combination of lectures, demonstrations, field trip, and practical experiences to educate the student in the basic skills required to work as a member of craft and creative discipline. This class will also be an introduction to the business and craft of design for art and creative industries. Craft Product Design will provide an overview of the professional world of craft design through a practical exhibition.

description.zh: 本課程為光電科學之概念介紹，本課程包括光的特性、固態物理概念、光的調變、顯示器、雷射、光偵測器、光纖維波導以及光通訊系統。
description.en: The course of Introduction to Optoelectronic Engineering introduces the concepts of the science of electro-optics. It consists properties of light, concepts of solid state physics, modulation of light, display devices, lasers, photo-detectors, fiber optical wave-guide and optical communication systems.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

name.zh: 植入物與矯具生物力學

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。生物力學是一門整合醫學與工學的學科。本課程介紹並討論十大主題：(1)脊椎生物力學、(2)關節生物力學、(3)骨折生物力學、(4)復健生物力學、(5)運動生物力學、(6)心血管生物力學、(7)植入物設計原理、(8)手術器械設計原理、(9)矯具設計原理與(10)病床與輪椅設計原理。
description.en: Biomechanics is a multi-discipline branch incorporating medicine and mechanics. Ten topics are introduced and discussed in this class: (1) spinal biomechanics, (2) joint biomechanics, (3) trauma biomechanics, (4) rehabilitation biomechanics, (5) sport biomechanics, (6) cardiovascular biomechanics, (7) implant design, (8) instrument design, (9) orthotice design, and (10) sickbed and wheelchair design.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

notes: 限博士班 綜科館708室

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意基本守恒定理，流體運動學，特殊形式方程式，理想流體（二維，三維勢流）表面波，低雷諾數流體，邊界層流體振波．
description.en: Basic Conservation Laws , Flow Kinematics , Special Forms of Governing Equations, Ideal-Fluid Flow ( Two-dimensional , Three-dimensional Potential Flows )Surface Waves , Low-Reynolds-Number Solutions , Boundary Layers , Shock Waves

description.zh: 本課程以介紹電腦在工程設計應用為主，內容有電腦輔助繪圖含電腦三維實體模型建立、電腦模擬、最佳設計、有限元素分析等。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided engineering techniques applied in mechanical engineering design. The course contents will include topics on computer aided design and draft including the creation of 3D solid model, computer simulation, Optimization technique, and finite element analysis techniques

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 製科所與機電所合開  限20人

description.zh: 本課程藉由優質學術論文內容的解析，協助研究生學習並改進學術論文寫作的技巧，經由實作增強投稿發表的能力。內容涵蓋學術論文主題的精選，研究問題的界定，文獻回顧的深入，論文結構的建立與文字的鋪陳，研究發現的討論與結論的撰寫，針對論文完成後投稿的步驟及審查意見的回覆等均以實例進行探討。
description.en: The course helps PhD students to practice and improve their writing skills for academic purposes. The key components of the course focuses on the discussion of some selected papers from high quality journal articles to absorb their writing and presenting skills. Hence, the students can have better opportunities to produce satisfied academic articles to meet the requirements for publication and degree dissertation.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始與邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of  Boundary-ValueProblems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 機械大四合開  一般教室 綜科327 限24人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。主要讓學生具有電腦控制之概念其內容涵蓋:電腦周邊設備簡介，PC-base 控制簡介，介面卡之選用，A/D與 D/A轉換原理與應用，I/O 介面實驗，程式設計與外部機械控制
description.en: Introduction of concept of computer control system, computer architecture, PC-base control unit, motion elements, selection of PC interface card, application of A/D and D/A conversion, program design and machine control

notes: 機械大四合開  限25人綜科802

description.zh: 本課程首先介紹機器人學的基礎知識，包括：移動學、運動學與動力學、機器人的感測、感知、與認知方法等；並且，簡介機器人的系統架構、軟/硬體設計與機器人導航的基本概念，最後以多項實作競賽方式評估同學們的學習成果
description.en: This course firstly introduces the fundamentals of robotics including locomotion of robots, kinematics and dynamics, sensory, perceptual and cognitive methods of robots. Moreover, system architecture, hardware and software design, and the concept of navigation are also introduced in the course. Several competitions are used to evaluate the learning performances of students at the end of this course.

description.zh: 工程分析概論，有限元素模型建立，進階模組技巧，實體模型的建立，一維元素分析，二維元素分析，三維元素分析，進階範例。
description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。氣體動力工程概論、壓縮氣體特性、空氣的調理與控制、空氣動力元件和控制迴路、順序控制器氣壓控制之應用、液壓工程基本原理、液壓流體之特性與調理、液壓動力源、致動器、控制元件及迴路、傳送、配管、維護與安全、液氣壓比例與伺服控制、自動控制理論應用於液氣壓工程。
description.en: Introduction to Pneumatic Engineering, Characteristic of Compressible Gas, Air Conditioning & Control, Pneumatic Parts & Control Circuit, Application of Sequence Controller on Pneumatic Control, Introduction to Hydraulic Engineering, Characteristic & Conditioning of Hydraulic Fluid, Hydraulic Theory, Power Unit, Actuator, Control Parts & safety,Hydraulic & Pneumatic Proportional & Servo Control, and Application of Automatic Control to Hydraulic Engineering.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 邀請專家講解工業4.0相關理論、應用實例、國家政策、關鍵議題、世界趨勢，藉由演講及提問討論的方式，提供學生將視野擴大、以及對工業4.0有全面了解的機會。
description.en: This course invites experts in the field of Industry 4.0 to introduce related background theories, examples, applications, government policies, critical issues, and current trends. This course aims to provide students with an overview of Industry 4.0 by means of talk, Q&A, and discussion.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 介紹基本精實理念和工具，主題包括： 1、精實原理 2、現場改善 3、徒勞辦識 4、流程製圖 5、產能分析 6、生產力分析 7、價值溪流圖 8、工作區組織與標準化 9、視覺控制/管理 10、廠房佈置及生產線平衡
description.en: Introduction to various lean concepts and lean tools at the basic level. Topics include lean principles, kaizen, none-value-adding identification, flow charting, capacity analysis, productivity analysis, value stream mapping, workplace organization and standardization, visual control/management, plant layout and line balancing.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

name.zh: 進階紙質文物修復與預防性維護
name.en: Advanced Paper Repair and Preventive Maintenance

description.zh: 透過介紹紙張的特性與種類，並將紙質變因做系統的理論介紹，將中西方的紙質修復技法結合案例分析，走訪田野調查實際了解目前紙質文物修復現況。
description.en: Through the paper describes the characteristics of the type of paper and do change due to systematic theoretical introduction, the Western paper repair techniques combined with case studies, practical fieldwork visits to understand the current status of the paper conservators.

notes: 限20人/修過105-1學期紙質修復與預防性維護系列課程才

name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh: 本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。      二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。      三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。      四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。      五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en: Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

description.zh: 車輛動力系統實驗內容包括: (1)熱工與引擎實驗；(2) 動力系統相關裝置實驗；(3)整車動力性能實驗。學生將學習車輛動力系統分析的基本技能，並練習如何應用適當工具量測、診斷、與分析車輛動力系統主要性能，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental analysis of vehicle powertrain, and utilizing tools to measure, diagnose, and analyze the major characteristics and performance of the vehicle powertrain. Topics include: (1) Thermal engineering and engine experiments, (2) Powertrain related devices experiments, and (3) Vehicle performance experiments.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 「系統整合指標」是智慧建築標章的基礎設施指標群，是做為評定在建築物內各項自動化服務系統在系統整合上之作為、成效與效益。 本課程將培養具備建築應用子系統運作原理與設計要點及工程執行作業與管理的基礎能力。 授課之內容如下：智慧建築系統整合指標以及各應用子系統，如中央監控系統、門禁與保全系統、對講與停車場系統、資通訊系統、綜合佈線與弱電系統、照明系統與CCTV監視系統、智慧家庭與物業管理系統之規劃設計及工程執行管理。
description.en: "System integration index" is the intelligent building marker infrastructure target group, is assessed as a service in the building automation system, the integration of the system as the effectiveness and benefit. This course will train with the principle of operation and construction applications subsystem design features and engineering job execution and management of basic capabilities. Teaching content as follows: Intelligent building integrated system of indicators as well as the application subsystems, such as the central monitoring system, access control and security systems, intercom and parking systems, ICT systems, premises distribution system and electronic systems, lighting systems and CCTV surveillance systems, intelligence design and planning of family and property management systems and project execution management.

notes: 電子大四、電機大四與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 智慧整合感控系統概論

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作智慧整合感控系統(CPS)，其中包括：感測、無線通訊、嵌入式系統與雲端計算相關技術，將以上課及實作的方式讓同學們習得智慧整合感控系統的相關背景知識和設計能力，預計在這門課之中，學生們將能以做中學的方式，並透過實習方式在嵌入式平台上練習定位、體感與分散式計算等系統建置。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in cyber-physical system design. The outline of this course is given as follows. 1. Introduction, 2. Embedded Development Tools and Environment, 3.Wireless Sensor (Multi-hop) Communication, 4. Discrete System and Sensor Modeling, 5. Distributed Computation Modeling.

description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 第1階段限博士生選,開學碩士生選須面試且不計畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程將從傳播理論與社會互動探討互動性的相關理論，並分析由互動性發展出的虛擬經驗，以及分析廠商藉由與顧客互動所產生的顧客知識要如何回應與管理，藉以建立良好的顧客關係。
description.en: The topics of this course include interactivity, and virtual experience, virtual community, quality of interactivity, interactive technology, customer service on the Internet, levels of customer relationship, transaction cost theory, Internet business model, interactive technology and customer and channel relationship.

name.en: Principles, practices, and applications of articulatory phonetics

description.zh: 此堂課將透過傳統和現代影像技術，來探討語音產生過程之構音動作。學生需檢視母語人士之構音變異性，並且對照非母語人士的構音方式 。構音變異探討將提供考慮第二語言發音教學或語音治療相關產業工作及應用之學生良好的基礎。
description.en: We will explore speech articulation with the help of traditional and modern imaging techniques. We will study the articulatory variation in native speech in comparison to that in non-native speakers’ speech. The discussion of articulatory variation will provide a solid foundation for careers in second language pronunciation teaching and speech pathology.

name.zh: 英語教學法及產業實務

description.zh: 本課程提供英語教學法及英語文教產業的介紹，課程內容聚焦英語教學理論及實務技巧的培養，包含英語課程設計、教材研發、英語教學活動及遊戲設計等。同時，此課程也將探討英語文教產業發展的趨勢與重要議題。
description.en: This course aims to provide an introduction to English language teaching (ELT) approaches and language education Industries. The course equips students with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills in ELT course design, teaching materials development, and learning activities and games design. The issues associated with the development of language education Industries will also be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生具備國際新聞編譯之相關知識，並透過實務演練培養新聞編譯之能力。課程內容主要含括(一)國際新聞編譯之介紹（如新聞編譯現況、製作流程、專業條件與譯者相關知能）；（二）新聞編譯之策略與技巧（如刪除、重組、整合新聞訊息）；（三）新聞編譯之模擬與實務練習。
description.en: This course aims to help students build up the basic knowledge of news trans-editing and develop students’ trans-editing skills through practical training. The course covers the following areas: (1) an introduction to news trans-editing (e.g. the current state of the news trans-editing field, the production workflow, professional qualifications and personal traits of news translators); (2) strategies and skills of news trans-editing (e.g. the strategies of deletion, restructuring, abridgement and synthesis); (3) practical training of news trans-editing in a simulated or real environment.

notes: 中央社國外新聞中心主任授課

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生熟悉新聞產業實務（含括電子、平面、網路新聞媒體）及其相關應用。內容主要涵蓋（一）新聞產業之介紹（如新聞產業現況、新聞道德、產製流程、記者角色、科技與新媒、國際與跨領域合作等）；（二）英語新聞之撰寫技巧與新聞風格；（三）台灣國內新聞採訪實務。
description.en: This course aims to familiarize students with news industry practices (including practices in print, electronic and online news media) and relevant applications. The following three aspects will be covered: (1) an introduction to the news industry (e.g. the current state of the news industry, news ethics, the news production workflow, the role of journalists, new media technologies and international/cross-disciplinary cooperation); (2) English news writing and news styles; (3) reporting practices (especially those related to news coverage of Taiwan).

notes: China Post 企業講師群；需修過新聞英語及聽力訓練

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

name.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務

description.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務內容包括輪胎平衡與校正、車輛四輪定位診斷與校正、輪胎拆卸操作與油電系統故障的檢測。學生將學習儀器操作的基本要求，並練習熟練適當工具的使用，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: Automotive diagnostic equipment operating practices include tire balance, vehicle wheel alignment, Changing tire operation and hybrid electric system failures inspections. Students will learn the basic requirements of instrument operation and practice with appropriate tools. This course focuses on the implementation of the exercise.

name.zh: 汽車檢診設備操作實務

Students will learn the basic requirements of instrument operation and practice with appropriate tools. This course focuses on the implementation of the exercise.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程之目的將探討酵素的功能及結構。針對醣類水解?水解各式各樣的多醣類做詳細探討。將目前已歸類的96家族中有晶體結構的家族中選出幾種家族做詳細的學習。從已發表文獻中來瞭解水解?可特定水解多醣類的特性。
description.en: This course will focus on glycoside hydrolases that hydrolyze various carbohydrates. Glycoside hydrolases have been classified to 96 families to date. The number of enzymes will be increase by time.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 以纖維材料與複合材料的知識為基礎，實際應用於纖維系複合材料實習；並利用各種現有之機械與電氣性質檢測儀器，對其性能加以評估。其實習內容包括熱可塑與熱固性樹脂之製備；單軸向、雙軸向與三軸向複合材料之加工等之實習;及複合材料機械與電氣性質等之實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the fiber and composites, various experiments are carried out.  Different measuring instruments are also used to measure and evaluate their mechanical and electrical properties.  The practice includes thermoplastic and thermosetting resin preparation, fiber prepreg preparation, 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D composites processing methods are included. Such as filament winding, hand lay-up, molding compounds, autoclave and vacuum bag method, injection molding, compression molding, SMC, and BMC, pultrusion etc. Otherwise, the mechanical and electrical properties of the composites are also studied.

notes: 限制 25位以下，大三與大四皆可以修。

description.zh: 1.寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3.多使用者偵測4.MIMO 5.時空傳輸技術 6.標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002012及3002015或負責教授同意。以單元實例說明機械設計之過程:設計理念、設計方法、設計步驟(物料及材質選用、元件設計、製造控制、及設計整合等)、品質與設計問題發生與破解實例、專題研究。
description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

notes: 機械大三合開 限30人

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development. We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study. (1) Economics of the global textile industry. (2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry. (3) The evolution of competitive strategies. (4) Countermeasures for industry. Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service. Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 使用者導向設計強調「以人為中心」的開發理念，而非以技術為中心；運用「設計思考」之理念，深入探索消費者未被滿足的需求與渴望。本課程以「使用者參與式設計」、「角色與情境故事」、「情境脈絡」等設計方法探索使用者之潛在需求，從研究對象本身的架構來探究行為與現象，挖掘創新概念。
description.en: User-centred Design is a process in which the needs, wants, and limitations of end users of a product are given extensive attention at each stage of the design process. It is a user-oriented innovative design process of discovering users’ potential demand and desire.This course introduces Ethnographic Research Method for discovering Users' Experience and Users' Value Models.  Methods include Participatory Design, User Profiles and Scenarios, Contextual Inquiry and Narrative Practice.Design practices will be carried out for creating broader and effective experience through service and products.

description.zh: 介紹當代應用於設計研究和發展自設計研究的各種重要理論，當作博碩士生研究與創作的準備。內容包括將設計視為目標導向、賦予價值的一般性問題解決活動，以及將設計視為檢驗溝通傳達過程與模式的調查研究，幫助研究生綜覽各種知識傳統下的設計理論，有效掌握並發展特定研究主題的適當理論與方法。
description.en: Introduction of contemporary theories applied to and developed in design research, in which design is considered as a mode of inquiry, including examination of communication process and models, and emphasizing general problem-solving as a goal-directed, value-laden activity.

description.zh: 課程以人因研究為基礎，分為四個階段：文獻資料收集與分析、人因實驗、創新設計、使用者受測評估實驗。透過系統化人因研究與應用設計之步驟與流程，帶領學生了解人因研究之實驗方法，啟發人本設計概念。
description.en: The course is based on ergonomic. There are four stages: literature review, ergonomic experiment, creative design and evaluation. Students will learn the scientific research method in ergonomic through step by step process.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(二)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (II)

description.zh: 針對特定設計議題，學生學習應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: Focusing on specific design issues, the subject directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(一)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(I)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 本課程係透過跨領域整合之創新思維，針對設計領域之專業理論與實務，進行相關文獻探討、個案研究及專題實務案例等深入研析，培養研究者之設計專業觀察與洞察能力，並能提出設計相關問題之解決方案，與具創新與前瞻性之具體可行方案，並實際應用於設計專案之實務操作，以期培育學生從創新思維到實務設計能力，進行設計教育之翻轉。
description.en: This course aims at the professional theory and practice in the field of design through the innovative thinking of interdisciplinary integration. It conducts in-depth research on relevant literatures and case studies. It can cultivate the professional ability of observation and insight of design professionals. Design-related solutions, and innovative and forward-looking concrete and feasible programs, and practical application of the practical operation of the design project, in order to cultivate students from innovative thinking to practical design capabilities, design education flip.

description.zh: 本課程培養學生職場必備的核心英文能力，主題包含英文履歷撰寫、商用英文書信、英文面試與簡報技巧、辦公室英文會話等。本課程同時加強學生基礎英文能力，如單字、文法、寫作等，並透過多元活動有系統性地發展英語溝通能力。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with the necessary English communication skills in the workplace. The content will include English resume writing, business English, English interviews, briefing skills, and office English conversation. This course will also strengthen students’ basic English skills, such as vocabulary, grammar, and writing.

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧在電影短評寫作上。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及關於電影場景、腳色、主題等的短評。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about movies. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about movie plots, characters, themes, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調電資專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Electrical Engineering and Computer Science students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

name.zh: 文法寫作及批判思考技巧
name.en: Advanced Grammar, Writing and Critical Thinking Skills

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來練習批判是思考。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種關於較爭議性的段落寫作，像是道德、政治和商業。學生會學到基礎堆論技巧，像是歸納、演繹、相互關係、因果關係、常見的謬誤等等。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to exercises in critical thinking. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about complex or controversial issues in ethics, politics, and business. Students will be introduced to some basic reasoning skills such as induction, deduction, correlation and causality, common fallacies, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

name.zh: 文法寫作及西方哲學概論
name.en: Advanced Grammar, Writing and Introduction to Western Philosophy

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來寫出關於西方文化傳統的基礎概念，如蘇格拉底以前，柏拉圖、荷馬的純哲學以及政治哲學。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種關於課堂閱讀的哲學家的段落寫作。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to read and write about basic concepts from the Western Philosophical Tradition from the pre-Socratics, Plato and metaphysics to Hobbes and political philosophy. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about the philosophers we shall read. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意（1） 瞬時平面運動學：Hartman構圖法,反曲點元，切線圓，Euer- Savary方程式，Bobillier構圖法，四連桿組耦桿之直線包絡線方程式，                      Higher Curvature（2） 平面連桿機構分析：Freudenstein方程式，速度及加速度，傳遞角與機械利益，多迴路連桿組分析（3） 其它機構分析：凸輪，齒輪組，非圓形齒輪
description.en: （1） Instantaneous Plane Kinematics:       Hartman's construction, Inflection circle ,Tangential circle ,Euler -Savary Equation ,Bobillier's construction, Higher curvature （2） Analysis of plane Linkage:        Freudenstein Equation, Velocity and Acceleration, Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage, Multiple-Loop linkage （3） Analysis of Cams, Gear Trains, Non-Circular Gears.

notes: 機電所與製科所合開【停開】

description.zh: 智慧財產權的攻防已成為知識經濟時代產業競爭的手段之一。21世紀「腦力經濟」時代最重要的戲規則就是「智慧財產權」，其同時亦為WTO會員國必須遵守之重要規範。本課程討論智慧財產權管理之法律與實務問題，將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於智慧財產權管理問題的瞭解。
description.en: Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members. This course includes law and practical management of Intellectual Property , and discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Intellectual Property Management for the students.

description.zh: 本課主要講授民法第三編物權篇的規定。相關的法律理論都會被介紹。學生將被指定閱讀教科書和法院判決。課堂參與是必要的。
description.en: This course teaches the rules of the third chapter of Civil Code. The third chapter defines property rights of our civil law system. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課程講授英美契約法。其他資訊請參閱英文概述。
description.en: This course teaches basic rules of contract law applied in the United States. While contract law is a law of a state, this course does not focus on any specific jurisdiction. Students will be assigned to read a textbook and several court decisions. Class participation is required.

description.zh: 本課程主要講授重點包括刑事訴訟之程序與執行等，並將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於刑事訴訟法的瞭解。本學期內容包括刑事訴訟基本理念與原則、迴避、管轄與強制處分。
description.en: This course focuses on the proceeding and enforcement of the law of criminal procedure. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Law of Criminal Procedure for the students. In this semester, major topics will include the basic concept, disqualification, jurisdiction and prosecutors' order of the law of criminal procedure.

description.zh: 無論就量而言或就質而言，債編均為民法中最為重要之部分。本課程旨在向修課同學作民法債編之概括介紹，包括債編總論及債編各論。再者，此一介紹包含下列四個重點：一、民法債編之背景及理論二、民法債編之解釋三、民法債編於案例事實之適用四、民法債編與民法其他部分及民事訴訟法之結合參與本課程乃理解民法債編及民法整體之關鍵一步，修課同學將受益匪淺。
description.en: "Obligations" is the most important part of the Civil Law, not only in quantity but in quality. This course aims to give participants a general introduction to "Obligations", including "General Provisions for Obligations" and "Kinds of Obligations". Furthermore, the introduction contains the following four points: 1. Background and theories of "Obligations".2. Interpretation of "Obligations".3. Application of "Obligations" to the facts.4. Combination of "Obligations", other parts of the Civil Law and the Civil Procedure Law.Attending this course is the critical step to understanding "Obligations" and the Civil Law as a whole, and it benefits participants a lot.

description.zh: 本課程係以太陽能產業為主的智慧財產權議題，授課內容將包括世界主要國家的太陽能發展政策、現有的太陽能技術與未來發展的方向，我國太陽能的產業現況，以及相關的法規與太陽能相關專利之智慧財產權議題。學生於本課程完成後，期能夠對此科技領域之相關技術資訊、產業現況與專利等相關智慧財產權議題與政策有一定的認識。
description.en: The class will introduce solar energy and relevant issues on Intellectual Property, including the developmental policies of top countries in the field, the current technologies for solar technology and its future tendency, the current industrial status in Taiwan, and relevant Patent and other IP issues on solar technologies. In the end of the class, students are hoped to understand the technical status, industrial status, and the relevant issues on patents and policies for solar energy.

notes: 科法學程與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程將可增進學生撰寫不同種法律文件之能力，包含律師函與其回覆、契約、內部備忘錄與信件。本課程將包括法律寫作的基礎、格式與範例、撰寫與修訂的練習、同儕審查、講授者進一步的回覆。於此課程結束後，學生經由不同種指定作業所完成的各類別文件，將可大輻度改善其寫作技巧。
description.en: This course will improve the ability of students to draft a wide variety of legal documents in English, including formal demand letters, responses to demands, contracts, internal memorandums and correspondence.  It will include instruction concerning the basics of good legal writing, forms and examples, practice in drafting and revising, peer review, and intensive feedback from the instructor. By the end of the course, students will have greatly improved writing skills and the beginnings of a sound collection of forms to assist with diverse writing assignments in their business.

description.zh: 本課程將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件，先申請原則、發明單一性及優先權。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 學生將有系統的瞭解人因照明的技術內涵、研究方法、使用領域規範以及應用技巧。課程中將結合實際案例講解人因照明設計手法與實際效果。該課程將有助於學生全面掌握照明硬體技術和以人為本的照明設計藝術，以及如何將兩者結合並應用在照明設計實務中。
description.en: Explore the concept and related technologies of ergonomic lighting in various applications.  Study the industry from an overall perspective, with emphasis on theories, research methods, international standards and design techniques.  Understand the definition of ergonomic lighting design, procedure and strategies, including evaluation of lighting quality, lighting technologies in hardware and software, as well as the art of lighting design.  Ergonomic lighting applications will be illustrated in case studies.

notes: 億光835；光電四與光電所合開

Understand the definition of ergonomic lighting design, procedure and strategies, including evaluation of lighting quality, lighting technologies in hardware and software, as well as the art of lighting design. description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務業的行銷與管理，主要內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務業創新（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）service innovation, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）service pricing.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

notes: 機電博所與製科所合開；限博士生修習

description.zh: 1.光纖感測介紹，2.光纖感測元件，3.光纖感測系統，4.光纖感測多工技術，5.光纖雷射感測系統，6.長距離光纖感測系統，7.大範圍多點光纖感測系統，8.光纖感測網路。
description.en: 1. Introduction to fiber optic sensor, 2. Fiber sensor devices, 3. Fiber sensor systems, 4. Fiber sensor multiplexing techniques, 5. Fiber-laser-based sensor systems, 6. Long-distance fiber sensor systems, 7. Large-scale multipoint fiber sensor systems, 8. Fiber sensor networks.

description.zh: 介紹計算機基本架構，硬體，軟體，程式設計，Algorithms及組合語言程式。
description.en: This course will focus on: basic structure of computer; applied; software﹝Office97, Lotus123…﹞; program design; algorithms and visual basic program.

notes: 計網電腦教室，限60人；分子一與工程一合開

description.zh: 介紹計算機基本架構，硬體，軟體，程式設計，Algorithms及組合語言程式。
description.en: This course will focus on: basic structure of computer; applied; software﹝Office97, Lotus123…﹞; program design; algorithms and visual basic program.

description.zh: 論文指導教授與醫師協商讓學生於在學期間的寒暑假到論文研究相關醫院進行實習。
description.en: Advisor in consultation with physicians suggest the student to practice at the hospital related to the thesis research during the winter and summer vacations at school.

name.zh: 綠色化學與潔淨技術特論
name.en: Special Topics on Green Chemistry and Clean Technology

description.zh: 目前永續發展已被視為推動社會和諧、經濟發展和環境保護的共同目標，化學科技則居中扮演一個非常關鍵的角色，因此，這門課程的主要目的是介紹綠色化學與潔淨技術的設計、開發和評估，其中包括：非傳統原料的利用、有利於生態的合成方法、設計更安全的化工產品以及生物合成和生物模擬原理的使用，並從原材料的選擇以至終端產物之整個生產流程，做一完整的評估以了解對人員安全健康以及生態的影響，並與對應的傳統製程相互比較。
description.en: Sustainable development is now accepted as a necessary goal for achieving societal, economic and environmental objectives. Within this chemistry has a vital role to play. Therefore, this course aims to introduce the students to the design, development, and evaluation processes of new Green Chemistry methodologies, and it include: alternative feedstocks, environmentally benign synthetic methodologies, designing safer chemical products, new reaction conditions, alternative solvents and catalyst development, and the use of biosynthesis and biomimetic principles. The students are introduced to the new evaluation process that encompasses the health and environmental impact of a synthetic pathway from choice of starting materials through to target molecule. Furthermore, comparisons and contrasts with classical methodologies are offered as illustrative examples in this course, too.

name.en: Applied Technology of the Internet of Things

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解物聯網 (Internet of Things)的本基概念及其所應用的各種技術。本課程包含(1)簡介(2)物聯網的基本架構及其關鍵技術，(3)物聯網感知層及其應用技術，(4)物聯網感網路層及其應用技術，(5)物聯網應用層及其應用技術，(6)無線感測網路工作原理及實習，(7)RFID工作原理及實習。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the basic concepts and applied technologies in the field of Internet of Things. The main subjects of this course include :(1) Introduction .(2)The basic structure of Internet of Things and it key technologies.(3) The device layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies. (4)The connect layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(5)The application layer of Internet of Things and it applied technologies.(6)The principle and practice of wireless sensor network.(7) The principle and practice of RFID.

description.zh: 1.自動化概念 2.個人電腦之介面 3.人機介面發展平台 4.視窗應用界（API）：動態連結程式庫（DLL）動態資料交換（DDE）及Active X基本程式設計 5.用戶端與伺服端系統架構 6.虛擬實境及多媒體的應用 7.簡介人工智慧專家系統模糊與類神經在人機界面的應用 8.圖形監控發展系統：輸出入DDE ， 網路DDE ， 監控網路 ，多感測系統。
description.en: main -machine Interface (MMI)1.Introduction to automation 2.Perosn computer Interface 3.Platform of main machine interface :Windows operation system. 4.Windows Application program Interface :DLL,DDE and active X program design.5. Client Server system 6.Multi-media and Virtual reality.7.Introduction to the application of AI, expert system, Fuzzy and neural network in MMI.8. Graphic Control user interface:I/DDE,NET DDE,monitor network and multi-sensory system.

description.zh: 由於網際網路與行動運算的快速發展，網路服務正引領潮流，網路服務創業成為目前服務業發展的主流，本課程主要在使學生瞭解網路服務的特性、品質、顧客滿意度以及網際網路服務的創新和創業策略等，期使企業未來能成為卓越網路服務公司。 課程內容包含網路服務產品創新、網路服務經營模式創新、網路服務行銷創新、網路服務組織創新、網路服務新事業創新等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。服務特性、服務傳送系統、服務品質、顧客滿意度、服務業經營策略、服務創新和模式、個案討論等。
description.en: Due to the rapid progress of internet and mobile computing, network services become very critical. Starting a business on network services has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. The focus of this course is to let student understand the nature, quality, customer satisfaction, innovation and entrepreneurship of network services. The expectation equips students with the ability to start a company that offers excellent network services.

name.zh: 雲端軟體建置與管理實務
name.en: Practices on Cloud Software Development and Management

description.zh: 本課程旨在培育雲端軟體系統開發與管理人才，邀請業界專家講授雲端軟體服務的開發與管理。課程內容涵蓋了：雲端產業論述、雲端軟體需求工程、雲端軟體設計、雲端資料導向系統設計、雲端文件管理系統設計、雲端報表管理系統設計、雲端資料轉移策略及雲端行動策略等議題。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the development and management of cloud software systems. We invite industrial experts to teach students how to build and manage cloud software systems. Topics include cloud software introduction, cloud requirements engineering, cloud software design, cloud data-driven application, cloud document management application, cloud report management application, cloud data migration and the mobile solution in cloud.

notes: 資財三四與資財所、最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theories, importance, scope, implementation constraints, methods, quality control tools of TQM.  Besides, the other management tools and approaches are also included.  The course also contains the possible problems and expected effective as implementing.

name.zh: 製造與工作環境之AR/VR實務
name.en: AR/VR Practice of Manufacturing and Workspace Design

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何把擴增實境(Augmented Reality)及虛擬實境(Virtual Reality)技術應用在製造業以及工作環境之實務設計。實務操作單元包含：人機互動系統實驗。
description.en: The goal of this course is to empower students in learning and applying the practical uses of AR (Augmented Reality) and VR (Virtual Reality) technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The practice sessions include: experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training and application of Unity, etc.

name.en: Technologies and Applications of Car Network

description.zh: 本課程內容著重於車輛網路技術之介紹、整合應用與未來發展，如現在車輛各嵌入式控制之機電整合次系統間的控制資訊，車輛與車輛間的駕駛與運動資訊傳遞，車輛與公共交通管理基礎系統訊息溝通，及車輛與雲端之連結與訊息傳遞，最後這方面的應用可說無遠弗屆，諸如生活資訊交流(物聯網)、車輛健康與維修等資訊之交換及統計分析(大數據)、駕駛健康與緊急事件之處理(智能照顧體系)、智能型導航，及因應正在發展中的移動式分享經濟模式發展所需之資訊交換。
description.en: This course will focus on the importance role of integrated application of information communication, which may interchange in between the car as a lot of subsystems made by embedded microcontrollers, occur in between a vehicle to another's(V2V, Vehicle to vehicle information for driving), vehicle to the public traffic infrastructure(the traffic management system of mega-city of highway) or vehicle to Cloud(all kinds of services can be integrated into, for example, living information, car repairing interactive information, driver health monitor, emergency event, smart navigation or many kinds of emerging and sharing  manipulation system for future travelling and motion.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.
